akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 107–110, title X, § 1011(5)(A), Jan. 8, 2002, 115 Stat. 1986

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 8091. Repealed. Pub. L. 107–110, title X, § 1011(5)(A), Jan. 8, 2002, 115 Stat. 1986
Section, Pub. L. 89–10, title X, § 10401, as added Pub. L. 103–382, title I, § 101, Oct. 20, 1994, 108 Stat. 3830; amended Pub. L. 104–208, div. A, title I, § 101(e) [title VII, § 709(b)(3)(A)], Sept. 30, 1996, 110 Stat. 3009–233, 3009–313, related to support for arts education.
